ComicInfo.Title: Space Jacked; Prisons; I Was a... Captive of The Insect Fiends!; For the Love of a Daemon
ComicInfo.Summary:
Contains the following stories:
Space Jacked
Prisons (Dresser/72)
I Was A… Captive of the Insectfiends!
For the Love of a Daemon
+ 2 untitled 1-2 page stories
FANTAGOR 4 © 1972 BY CORBEN, BOXELL, DRESSER, GORE, AND (Myron D.) HOLMAN. PUBLISHED BY LAST GASP ECO FUNNIES.
